title: Mommy and Daddy want to F%#&
description: Mommy and Daddy want to F%#& is a children's book for grown-ups! A hilarious story of a Mommy and Daddy who just need a little "alone time" to themselves, and will do almost anything to get it. If you're the parents of little kids - or know anybody who is- this book is for you!
author: Michael Glouberman
